item.title: The Loss, by Michael John Grist
item.description: 14:02 Saturday 16 April 2016 JST I’m on the ARC (Advanced Review Crew (or something)) for British Mike’s books. (Playing ultimate back in the day, we had Canadian Mike and British Mike.) ABout a month ago we received the advanced review copy of The Loss - Zombie Ocean 4 and today I finished it! This is the fourth book in MJG’s Zombie Ocean, and it’s easily the best of the series so far!
